video.title: Columbo
video.synopsis: Raincoat-wearing detective Columbo always outwits the killer by asking 'just one more thing' in this Emmy-winning series featuring famous guest stars.

episodes.synopsis: When one member of a mystery writing team wants to break from his less talented partner, he becomes the victim in a real-life murder mystery.
episodes.title: Murder By the Book

episodes.synopsis: When a businessman's wife is murdered by a blackmailing private investigator, the businessman unwittingly hires the killer to find... the killer! But enter Columbo, who has a trick or two up his sleeve. Ray Milland and Robert Culp guest star.
episodes.title: Death Lends a Hand

episodes.synopsis: A woman accuses a retired general and war hero of murder, only to find herself the object of his affections. Is he a killer, or was it all in her head? Columbo's on the case to discover the truth. Suzanne Pleshette and Eddie Albert guest star.
episodes.title: Dead Weight

episodes.synopsis: A wealthy art collector is murdered, and all signs point to a robbery gone wrong. But the dead man's nephew's alibi is a little too convenient, and Columbo pulls a fast one to ferret out the killer. Don Ameche and Ross Martin guest star.
episodes.title: Suitable for Framing

episodes.synopsis: Columbo has doubts when a woman shoots her meddlesome brother and claims she thought he was an intruder. Was it a tragic accident, or a premeditated way of ridding herself of her brother's controlling ways? Leslie Nielsen and Susan Clark guest star.
episodes.title: Lady in Waiting

episodes.synopsis: When the heir to a chemical company is blackmailed into turning over control of the family business, he hatches an ingenious scheme to bomb the blackmailer -- his own uncle. Can Columbo see through the perfect murder plot? Roddy McDowall guest stars.
episodes.title: Short Fuse

episodes.synopsis: Elliot Markham, a brilliant architect and con-man, murders a Texas millionaire and hides his body in order to keep his visionary construction project financed.
episodes.title: Blueprint for Murder

episodes.synopsis: An amoral conductor murders the gifted pianist with whom he is having an affair. Lt. Columbo is on the case.
episodes.title: Etude in Black

episodes.synopsis: An uncle and nephew plan an elaborate kidnapping scheme to get their hands on the nephew's trust fund cash. But when the uncle double-crosses his partner, Columbo searches for clues he needs to crack the case wide open. Ray Milland guest stars.
episodes.title: The Greenhouse Jungle

episodes.synopsis: The discontented manager of a football team kills the team's owner during a game and constructs an elaborate alibi. But it's what's missing from the alibi that tips Columbo off. Robert Culp and Dean Stockwell guest star.
episodes.title: The Most Crucial Game

episodes.synopsis: On a working trip to London, Columbo gets embroiled in the case of a producer murdered by a pair of washed-up Shakespearean actors.
episodes.title: Dagger of the Mind

episodes.synopsis: When an aging movie star's assistant turns up dead, Columbo suspects an accident. But soon enough he begins to wonder if it was a murder designed to cover up a much older crime. Anne Baxter guest stars.
episodes.title: Requiem for a Falling Star

episodes.synopsis: When a talented and ambitious heart surgeon sees an opportunity to eliminate one of his ailing rivals, he plans an ingenious -- and lethal -- surgery for the man. Will Columbo catch on to the ploy before it's too late? Leonard Nimoy guest stars.
episodes.title: A Stitch in Crime

episodes.synopsis: Columbo is on the case when a chess champion who survived being shoved down a garbage chute is then finished off in the hospital. Is the killer the man's competitive rival for chess's top honors? Laurence Harvey guest stars.
episodes.title: The Most Dangerous Match

episodes.synopsis: When a wealthy man turns up dead before he can marry his much younger, gold-digging fiancée, Columbo suspects one of the man's identical twin nephews is the culprit. But which one? Martin Landau, Julie Newmar and Dabney Coleman guest star.
episodes.title: Double Shock

episodes.synopsis: A cosmetics manufacturer is suspected of murdering an employee (Martin Sheen) who stole a wrinkle-removing formula.
episodes.title: Lovely But Lethal

episodes.synopsis: A suave wine connoisseur commits fratricide when he discovers his brother plans to sell the family winery.
episodes.title: Any Old Port in a Storm

episodes.synopsis: A U.S. senator in a tight reelection fakes a series of death threats and then kills his campaign manager, making it look like he was the intended target. Will Columbo see through the politician's hot air? Jackie Cooper guest stars.
episodes.title: Candidate for Crime

episodes.synopsis: Columbo must dig deep when a brilliant filmmaker and blackmailer uses subliminal cuts in a movie to lure his victim to his death. But with an airtight alibi, will he get away with murder? Robert Culp guest stars.
episodes.title: Double Exposure

episodes.synopsis: Faced with an author who wants to sell his book to a rival company, a publisher has the writer killed, then tries to throw Columbo off track by framing himself for the murder. Jack Cassidy, Mickey Spillane and Mariette Hartley guest star.
episodes.title: Publish or Perish

episodes.synopsis: After his son plagiarizes research, a brilliant scientist bumps off the colleague who's threatened to expose the misdeed and programs a robot to give himself the perfect alibi. José Ferrer guest stars.
episodes.title: Mind Over Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: Johnny Cash guest stars as a country singer who kills his blackmailing wife by causing their plane to crash. But when he alone emerges from the wreckage almost unscathed, Columbo starts to dig deeper into the musician's past.
episodes.title: Swan Song

episodes.synopsis: A police commissioner provides an alibi to a friend who has just killed his wife. Later the commissioner kills his own wife, and gets the friend to repay the favor.
episodes.title: A Friend in Deed

episodes.synopsis: When the owner of one of fitness expert Milo Janus's gym franchises is murdered, Columbo looks into the famous exercise maven's finances. Robert Conrad and Pat Harrington Jr. guest star.
episodes.title: An Exercise in Fatality

episodes.synopsis: When well-known photographer Paul Galesko's wife is killed, the clues point to an ex-convict. But Columbo smells something fishy and digs deeper into the case. Dick Van Dyke, Joyce Van Patten and Larry Storch guest star.
episodes.title: Negative Reaction

episodes.synopsis: After the school cannon kills the chair of the board of trustees for a military academy, Columbo investigates the "accident." Father and son Bruce and Bruno Kirby guest star; Patrick McGoohan won an Emmy for his portrayal of the school president.
episodes.title: By Dawn's Early Light

episodes.synopsis: Automobile executive Hayden Danziger is a prime suspect in the murder of a cruise ship's featured vocalist.
episodes.title: Troubled Waters

episodes.synopsis: When an electronics whiz's mother-in-law is killed, a home security tape recording the murder may not be as reliable as it seems. Oskar Werner and Gena Rowlands guest star.
episodes.title: Playback

episodes.synopsis: When Nadia Donner's husband is killed in what appears to be a home robbery, Columbo suspects her psychiatrist, with whom she's been having an affair. George Hamilton and Lesley Ann Warren guest star.
episodes.title: A Deadly State of Mind

episodes.synopsis: An aging dancer-movie queen (guest star Janet Leigh) yearns for a return to the glamour and glitter of show business so intensely that she plans her husband's demise.
episodes.title: Forgotten Lady

episodes.synopsis: Diplomatic immunity and solid alibis hamper Columbo's case after the head of security for a visiting Middle Eastern dignitary is murdered. Hector Elizondo and Sal Mineo guest star.
episodes.title: A Case of Immunity

episodes.synopsis: Emmy-winning actor Patrick McGoohan guest-stars as a homicide suspect whose devious answers are prompted by his hidden identity as a top spy.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: While on vacation in Mexico, Columbo is asked to investigate when the friend of famous matador Luis Montoya is killed by a bull. Ricardo Montalban and A Martinez guest star.
episodes.title: A Matter of Honor

episodes.synopsis: Columbo investigates after Cabaret of Magic club owner Jesse Jerome dies during a water tank escape illusion performed by celebrated magician the Great Santini. Jack Cassidy and Robert Loggia guest star.
episodes.title: Now You See Him

episodes.synopsis: When retired ship builder Commodore Swanson is murdered on the eve of selling his company, suspicion falls on his son-in-law, Charles, who's been running things -- until Charles turns up dead, too. Robert Vaughn and Diane Baker guest star.
episodes.title: Last Salute to the Commodore

episodes.synopsis: Actor Ward Fowler, who plays a television detective, matches wits with Columbo after Claire Daley, his producer and ex-lover, is murdered. William Shatner guest stars.
episodes.title: Fade in to Murder

episodes.synopsis: Columbo investigates a museum curator after her brother is found murdered in the museum their family runs. Joyce Van Patten and Celeste Holm guest star.
episodes.title: Old Fashioned Murder

episodes.synopsis: When a genius businessman is found murdered at the clubhouse for a Mensa-like organization, Columbo has dozens of brilliant witnesses. Samantha Eggar, Theodore Bikel, Sorrell Booke and a very young Jamie Lee Curtis guest star.
episodes.title: The Bye-Bye Sky High IQ Murder Case

episodes.synopsis: Columbo investigates when an award-winning crime writer's nephew is found murdered several months after his wife's killing. Ruth Gordon and Mariette Hartley guest star.
episodes.title: Try and Catch Me

episodes.synopsis: After a chef is killed, Columbo discovers that a famous food critic expects bribes from restaurant owners for good reviews. Louis Jourdan, Richard Dysart, France Nuyen and Mako guest star; Oscar winner Jonathan Demme directs.
episodes.title: Murder Under Glass

episodes.synopsis: After network television executive Mark McAndrews is killed, Columbo suspects his ambitious assistant (and lover) who was passed over for promotion. Trish Van Devere and Lainie Kazan guest star.
episodes.title: Make Me a Perfect Murder

episodes.synopsis: When a famous psychiatrist's friend is mauled to death by the psychiatrist's Doberman pinschers, Columbo suspects it's not an accident. Kim Cattrall and Ed Begley Jr. guest star.
episodes.title: How to Dial a Murder

episodes.synopsis: Clive Revill guest-stars as a charming Irish poet whose verse belies his deadly scheme for homicide and arms smuggling.
episodes.title: The Conspirators
